name: Paper files
description: Paper materials include the information sheet, consent forms, checklist for testing and the goal and rumination ratings
These are found on sharepoint in 'Printed' in '2020 Documents and Protocol
The uncompleted printed materials are stored in the lab in the black letter trays
Completed materials are stored in the locked cabinet in MDC group office
The files are currently stored by document rather than by participant
i.e. consent forms are on separate shelf, one wallet contains checklists, one wallet contains goal ratings and another wallet contains

name: Harddrives and dongle
description: The two harddrives and dongle for AcqKnowledge are stored with the paper files in the locked cabinet in MDC group office
I use just one harddrive for backing up files
Once a week, add new files onto the second hardddrive

name: E-prime and psychophys
description: At the end of the day, all raw data from the EEG and psychophys computer needs uploading to sharepoint
Lab computers are not connected to network therefore this is via hard drive (or memory stick for psychophys computer)
This also means the harddrive contains back up of data too
You will need to first move the eprime files from the live versions into a participant folder under 'Data'
On my laptop, I then copy the memory stick files over onto the harddrive and then all files are uploaded into raw files on sharepoint

name: Goal and rumination ratings
description: The hardcopies of the ratings are stored in the cabinet
The hardcopies need scanning and imported into the 'scans' folder on Sharepoint
The data also needs entering into the 'Problem ratings' spreadsheet on SharePoint
